subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Linebacker Rolando McClain is retiring from the N.F.L. McClain, 23,  played three seasons with the Oakland Raiders before signing a one-year contract with Baltimore as a free agent on April 12.
snippet: Linebacker Rolando McClain is retiring from the N.F.L. McClain, 23,  played three seasons with the Oakland Raiders before signing a one-year contract with Baltimore as a free agent on April 12.
